channel.title: How to create a new runner
channel.description:
Hi,
I want to create a new runner, Where can i find the doc to help me for that ?
Thank You

item.title: How to create a new runner
item.dc:creator: User42
item.description:
Hi,
This is the doc reference to action-runner to create an action using an existing runner. I want to create my own runner. I use a particular tool launched on multiple host with different option, I want to create the runner tool to parse the output and sort my hosts (failed/success) etcâ€¦

Read full topic
